Class heap.HFPage 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----diskmgr.Page
           |
           +----heap.HFPage
public class HFPage
extends Page
implements ConstSlot, GlobalConst
Class heap file page. The design assumes that records are kept compacted when deletions are performed.
